questions.question_text: Under normal operations, Cisco recommends that you configure switchports on which VLAN?

choices.A: on any VLAN except the default VLAN

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
on any VLAN except the default VLAN

Selected Answer: A
Answer is A

The answer should be A.

Explanation: 

http://www.ciscopress.com/articles/article.asp?p=2181837&seqNum=11

VLAN Design Guidelines (3.3.2.1)
Cisco switches have a factory configuration in which default VLANs are preconfigured to support various media and protocol types. The default Ethernet VLAN is VLAN 1. It is a security best practice to configure all the ports on all switches to be associated with VLANs other than VLAN 1. 

This is usually done by configuring all unused ports to a black hole VLAN that is not used for anything on the network. All used ports are associated with VLANs distinct from VLAN 1 and distinct from the black hole VLAN. It is also a good practice to shut down unused switch ports to prevent unauthorized access.

questions.question_text: Which six-byte field in a basic Ethernet frame must be an individual address?
Which part of the PPPoE server configuration contains the information used to assign an IP address to a PPPoE client?

discussion.content:
Answer A is Correct:
The pool of IP addresses from which clients are assigned a negotiated address is specified in the interface virtual-template

ISP1(config)# interface virtual-template 1
ISP1(config-if)# ip address 10.0.0.1 255.255.255.0
ISP1(config-if)# peer default ip address pool VTpool

comments.content:
A is correct 
Dialer Inter holds the L2 configuration for PPPoE Clients

discussion.content: Shouldn't this be C dialer interface !!!
I think correct answer is site-to-site VPN

comments.content:
The questione ask for multiple sites across the internet, a site-to-site VPN woulb be used for only one site, not for multiple sites.
The answer should be B

questions.question_text: Which technology can provide security when connection multiple sites across the internet?
Which functionality does an SVI provide?

discussion.content: The correct answer is B. The only reason you configure the SVI on a layer 2 switch is for remote administration purposes.

comments.content: Remote administration relates to configuration of the switch default gateway.

choices.D: OSI Layer 3 connectivity to switches C
